verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> to <S%H2142>bring<s%> to <S%H2142>remembrance.<s%> O <S%H3068>lord,<s%> <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> me not in your <S%H7110>wrath:<s%> neither <S%H3256>chasten<s%> me in your <S%H2534>hot<s%> <S%H2534>displeasure.<s%>
For your <S%H2671>arrows<s%> <S%H5181>stick<s%> fast in me, and your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5181>presses<s%> me sore.

There is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4974>soundness<s%> in my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of your <S%H2195>anger;<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> is there any <S%H7965>rest<s%> in my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of my <S%H2403>sin.<s%>
For my <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> are <S%H5674>gone<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> my <S%H7218>head:<s%> as an <S%H3515>heavy<s%> <S%H4853>burden<s%> they are too <S%H3513>heavy<s%> for me.
My <S%H2250>wounds<s%> <S%H887>stink<s%> and are <S%H4743>corrupt<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of my <S%H200>foolishness.<s%>
I am <S%H5753>troubled;<s%> I am <S%H7817>bowed<s%> <S%H7817>down<s%> <S%H3966>greatly;<s%> I <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6937>mourning<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> long.
For my <S%H3689>loins<s%> are <S%H4390>filled<s%> with a <S%H7033>loathsome<s%> disease: and there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4974>soundness<s%> in my <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
I am <S%H6313>feeble<s%> and <S%H5704>sore<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H1794>broken:<s%> I have <S%H7580>roared<s%> by reason of the <S%H5100>disquietness<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H8378>desire<s%> is <S%H5048>before<s%> you; and my <S%H585>groaning<s%> is not <S%H5641>hid<s%> from you.
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5503>pants,<s%> my <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H5800>fails<s%> me: as for the <S%H216>light<s%> of my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> it <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H369>gone<s%> from me.
My <S%H157>lovers<s%> and my <S%H7453>friends<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5048>aloof<s%> from my <S%H5061>sore;<s%> and my <S%H7138>kinsmen<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H7350>afar<s%> off.

They also that <S%H1245>seek<s%> after my <S%H5315>life<s%> lay <S%H5367>snares<s%> for me: and they that <S%H1875>seek<s%> my <S%H7451>hurt<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H1942>mischievous<s%> things, and <S%H1897>imagine<s%> <S%H4820>deceits<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> long.
But I, as a <S%H2795>deaf<s%> man, <S%H8085>heard<s%> not; and I was as a <S%H483>dumb<s%> man that <S%H6605>opens<s%> not his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
Thus I was as a <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H8085>hears<s%> not, and in whose <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8433>reproofs.<s%>
For in you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> do I <S%H3176>hope:<s%> you will <S%H6030>hear,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>

For I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6030>Hear<s%> me, <S%H6435>lest<s%> otherwise they should <S%H8056>rejoice<s%> over me: when my <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H4131>slips,<s%> they <S%H1431>magnify<s%> themselves <S%H5921>against<s%> me.
For I am <S%H3559>ready<s%> to <S%H6761>halt,<s%> and my <S%H4341>sorrow<s%> is <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me.
For I will <S%H5046>declare<s%> my <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> I will be <S%H1672>sorry<s%> for my <S%H2403>sin.<s%>
But my <S%H341>enemies<s%> are <S%H2416>lively,<s%> and they are <S%H6105>strong:<s%> and they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H8267>wrongfully<s%> are <S%H7231>multiplied.<s%>
They also that <S%H7999>render<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%> are my <S%H7853>adversaries;<s%> <S%H8478>because<s%> I <S%H7291>follow<s%> the thing that <S%H2896>good<s%> is.
<S%H5800>Forsake<s%> me not, O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> O my <S%H430>God,<s%> be not <S%H7368>far<s%> from me.
Make <S%H2363>haste<s%> to <S%H5833>help<s%> me, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> my <S%H8668>salvation.<s%>
